text: Yesli by eti litsemery, kotoryye poritsali tebya za razdachu milostyni i dobychi, byli by dovol'ny tem, chto darovali im Allakh i Yego poslannik, kakoy by maloy ni byla ikh dolya, i skazali by: "Dovol'no nam Allakha! On nam daruyet iz shchedrot Svoikh, i Yego poslannik nam dast v budushchem po Yego ukazaniyu yeshcho bol'she. Ved' my stremimsya k povinoveniyu Allakhu i Yego shchedrosti!" Yesli by oni tak delali, bylo by luchshe dlya nikh
